title: Gragas is overloaded.
body:
Engage  - disengage  ,  tankiness ,dmg ,  sustain ,  aoe   cc   , can clear the jungle easily 
im prepared to get downvoted by this gragas mains for telling the truth

replies.body:
...and yet he has a win rate below 50%. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Anyways, what are you trying to accomplish here exactly?

OP is probably trying to achieve Gragas's pickban in competitive to be noticeably less than 100% before worlds...

Winrates are not everything.
Eh I just wish they fixed his E mid flash thing. Hes fine if Riot fixes it

He's hardly "overloaded." 

Honestly I cringe whenever I see someone use this term. I'd say his issues are that he does way too much damage innately, especially for how tanky he gets. And for all that potential upside, with his ult being game changing, keep in mind it can lose games as much as it can win games.

Outside of that, he doesn't bug me

Whoah whoah wait a minute you can't say things like that gragas is uh totally fine and good for the game, riot even condones pros picking him year round
s-so what if he does everything perfectly while others don't that's b-balanced

I could literally list every champion's kits and make them sound overpowered like you do with Grag, even the weakest ones. At least use some sort of statistic or comparison. Off the top of my head i'm sure Lee and Zac have every single one of those traits you just mentioned.
If this current Gragas is "overloaded" I wouldn't even wanna see what you would call pre-reword Gragas...
He can have that but his damage is meh unless you purposely build something

Urgot is overloaded, tanky, damage reduction ult, point and click abilities, DoT, Insane AoE Fear, point and click suppress, poke, etc. 

See the flaw in your way of thinking? I can literally make any champion seem OP if I cherry pick strengths while ignoring everything else.

With the ult change he's not going to be nearly as OP anymore. That being said I would love if they just remove the ability to use flash during his body slam. Flash should interrupt what movement spell you're using and not instead be used as a guaranteed feature for him and shen to land their CC. This way he would be much less of an issue and wouldn't require to be as gutted.
